---
title: Loading datasets
author: Marie-Hélène Burle
---

:::{.def}

There are already good tools to load datasets (e.g. [PyTorch](https://pytorch.org/), [TensorFlow](https://www.tensorflow.org/), [Hugging Face](https://huggingface.co/)), so JAX does not have its own implementation. In this section, we will see an example using Hugging Face.

:::
